description:
Made for kids who live to ski and board no matter what the weather. When it’s wet, the waterproof inserts keep the damp out. When it’s really cold and body heat isn’t enough, slip a couple of heat packs into the custom-made zippered pockets to keep those little fingers thawed.

  • Shell is mini-ripstop polyester
  • Dri-Max waterproof insert blocks the wet
  • Megaloft® synthetic insulation doesn’t pack out if damp
  • Ultra-soft brushed thermofleece lining provides next-to-skin comfort, warmth, and moisture wicking
  • Palm is protected with tough, grippy polyurethane
  • Zippered heat pack pocket
  • Gauntlet length with cinch closure ensures gap-free overlap with jacket sleeve
name: Gordini Ultra Dri-Max Gauntlet IV Mitts Junior - Children to Youths
